title: Coat with belt
description:
embroidered ivory leather coat lined with sheep wool; colors: black, red, aqua, green, purple and blue in various shades; floral and foliate motifs; black fur around neck opening; black fur (?) around sleeve hem and bottom of coat, down center front and approximately 4 \" from front opening from collar to 12\" above hem; loop closure with leather covered tasselate balls as buttons - leather decorative applique pieces around sleeves, pocket openings, along seams, front opening and in design
b.) braided leather belt (?) with long tassels at each end; red and black braid; leather red and aqua covered balls match fasteners on coat; leather tassels on end; received in three pieces: one double-braid tassel with large leather covered ball joining pieces and two separate tassel braids
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
